name: The Bell
desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Whopperflower Nectar
materials.desc:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Whopperflower Nectar
materials.desc:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Shimmering Nectar
materials.desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Shimmering Nectar
materials.desc:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Energy Nectar
materials.desc:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Energy Nectar
materials.desc:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.text: is available from all Character Event Wishes and Weapon Event Wishes, even when it is not a featured Weapon with a boosted drop-rate.

customize.name: Astral Vulture's Crimson Plumage
customize.desc: An ancient longbow crested with red feathers, a sacred relic of the Flower-Feather Clan that has been passed down from generation to generation.

customize.name: The First Great Magic
customize.desc: A stage prop once used by a past "Great Magician." Its final secret was that it was also a weapon beyond the pale.

customize.name: Flower-Wreathed Feathers
customize.desc: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.

customize.name: The Flute
customize.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

customize.name: Waveriding Whirl
customize.desc: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Verdict
customize.desc: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.

customize.name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
customize.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.

customize.name: Rust
customize.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

customize.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
customize.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.

customize.name: Eye of Perception
customize.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Uraku Misugiri
customize.desc: This famous blade was once created by the hand of Urakusai, the renowned literatus. Legend has it that it has never cut any living creature in all these hundreds of years.

customize.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
customize.desc: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

customize.name: Alley Hunter
customize.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

customize.name: The Alley Flash
customize.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Splendor of Tranquil Waters
customize.desc: A scepter around which swirls pure water. In days long past, it once symbolized the highest authority over the seas.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
customize.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.

customize.name: Favonius Warbow
customize.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

customize.name: Lion's Roar
customize.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

customize.name: Wine and Song
customize.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
customize.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

customize.name: Calamity Queller
customize.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

customize.name: Favonius Warbow
customize.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Kagura's Verity
customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.name: Polar Star
customize.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

customize.name: The Stringless
customize.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.name: Hunter's Path
customize.desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

customize.name: Vortex Vanquisher
customize.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

customize.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
customize.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.name: Skyward Spine
customize.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

value.text: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to <color=#37ffff>20%/23%/26%/29%/32%</color> of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> increased DMG.

value.name: The Bell
value.desc:
Rebellious Guardian: The Bell

There once was a traitor who brandished a blade against his fallen clan.

Though this individual was eventually cast out from his clan, rumor has that his organization continued their chosen duties.

Legend claims that even the Wolf Pup Rostam might have been involved...

desc.text:
A strange greatsword decorated with an exquisite clock.
The distinctive sound of clockwork served as a combat rhythm for the wielder and their friends.
After the Wanderer's Troupe disbanded, the greatsword was soaked in acid. The gears have rusted because of this.
Even so, it still makes a lethal weapon.
One by the name of Kreuzlied traveled with the Wanderer's Troupe. Once a member of the ruling Lawrence Clan, now a traitor and outcast.
In that time, scholars and bards paid no heed to history. For the Aristocracy preferred to remain willfully ignorant of their own moral degeneracy than face history's judgment.
But the aristocrats trembled in fear at the sound of this blade as it flew through the air, for it was the toll of the bell of judgment.
It was not made public what punishment Kreuzlied met with after the failed uprising. This in itself is a testament to his privileged origins.
Legend says that after being dismissed from office, his desire to continue the legacy of his fellow rebels led him to establish a secret society aimed at bringing down the Aristocracy.
It is also said that he gave his full assistance to the enslaved gladiator when she revolted.
In the past, a popular rumor was that Kreuzlied's secret society was working constantly in the background,
Helping the Knights of Favonius keep Mondstadt safe through deeds that no knight should ever be party to.
It was even said that the Wolf Pup Rostam ran this organization in secret, behind the Grand Master's back.
